name: EncounterBusinessStatusAgedCare
title: Encounter Business Status (Aged Care / HACC)
description: Operational and business workflow statuses for aged care and home/community care encounters.

concept.definition: The client's care package is currently active and services are being delivered.
The care plan or funding is temporarily paused (e.g., hospital admission, travel).
Awaiting funding or package approval from a governing body.
Funding approval has been received and services may commence.
The client is currently in a short-term respite stay.
Encounter suspended due to compliance, payment, or operational reasons.
The encounter is administratively and clinically complete.
The encounter was ended early by client or provider decision.
